title: RMPBufferedMessage (Struct)
text:
TYPE RMPBufferedMessage : STRUCT
The structure representing a message buffered in the RMP (Reliable Message Protocoll)

rows.Name: uiHandle
rows.Comment:
Is unique handle and indicates send order; only Bit0-14 are
used

rows.Name: byStatusBits
rows.Comment:
Bit0: TRUE: this buffer entry is unused
Bit1: TRUE: this buffer entry is locked and may not be freed or deleted by anyone except the owner THIS ENTRY MUST BE SET WITH TESTANDSET
Bit2: TRUE: editing is ongoing

rows.Name: tValidity
rows.Comment: Time distance, how long this message will bevalid
